# penmodel

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

penmodel provides tools for modeling pension fund benefits and finances. It works with the package pendata, which provides data files in a consistent format for use in penmodel.

## Installation

You can install the development version of penmodel like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("donboyd5/penmodel")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(penmodel)
## basic example code
```
